trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
There were no other sightings in Orlando on or around October 13th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsStepping out of my house to have a cigarette. The light object was coming from the south. Just like a star bright stedy light. It was coming from the South direction heading North a bit to the east. Going slowly and no sound at all. Light was very bright and low alost like the altitude of a helicopter. This was not a helicopter. After stairing at it moving after about 30 - 40 seconds, it changed color to an orange redish color for about 5 seconds and began dimming fading to black to what looked like a black shadow and disapears. Sky had no clouds so it did not hide behind a cloud. It seemed to have past over Clark road in the Northwest area of Orlando close to Ocoee. At first I wasnt sure of what it could be, I couldnt take my eyes off of it because I was curious what it could be.
